snippet: The ice cream and fast food chain said 395 of its stores were affected in the breach which occurred from August to September.
abstract: Dairy Queen discloses that its payment systems were breached by hackers who may have gained access to customer names and credit and debit card information; says 395 of its stores around country were affected.
lead_paragraph: The ice cream and fast food chain said 395 of its stores were affected in the breach which occurred from August to September.

headline.main: Dairy Queen Says Hackers Broke Into Payment Systems
headline.print_headline: Dairy Queen Says Hackers Broke Into Payment Systems
